overview: See Barbara The Barbarian seek and conquer every sexual fantasy of your dreams...  Watch Barbara The Barbarian destroy lover after lover, friend or foe, man or woman...  Discover Barbara The Barbarian releasing the sex-hungry savage that lives only in your wildest erotic imagination...  Barbara Dare... the body.  Barbara Dare... the beauty.  Barbara Dare... The Barbarian!!!
tagline: An erotic fantasy that goes beyond ancient times to a mythical and imaginary era.
title: Barbara the Barbarian
